channel.title: Admin commands help!
channel.description:
I need admin/owner commands badly....
::ipban (username)
::kill (username) IF THATS POSSIBLE
::warn (username)
::giveadmin (username)
::givemod (username)
PLEASE GIVE ME SOME OF THESE COMMANDS THX!!!

item.title: Admin commands help!
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:

item.title: Admin commands help!
item.dc:creator: @gs1 gs
item.description:
@gs1 wrote:

if(command.startsWith("admin") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Gs")) { String name = command.substring(6); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.playerRights = 2; c.sendMessage("Your admin !!!"); }

if(command.startsWith("mod") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Gs")) { String name = command.substring(4); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.playerRights = 1; c.sendMessage("Your mod !!!"); }

if(command.startsWith("undo") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Gs")) [{ String name = command.substring(5); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.playerRights = 0; c.sendMessage("You didn't payed so no admin or mod anymore ... ! behave !"); }

}

[code] if(command.startsWith(“warn”) && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Gs”)))
{
String victim = command.substring(10);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is warning "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully given macro warning”);
appendToMacroWarn(victim);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/macro.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" warned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging warning!");
 }
  }

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./logs/macro.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" warned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging warning!");
 }
  }

}[/code]

checkMacroWarn(); if(checkWarn)() == 5) { sendMessage("You have 1 black mark as you have been caught autoing..."); sendMessage("If you are caught massing again this WILL result in further action being taken"); sendMessage("against your account."); }
the mod and admin dont work for me idk why but warn works

Read full topic
